ValidationRule.description: If Case Origin = Phone and if Type = Quotes/Availability, Place Order, Order Status, Order Changes or Web, then this field is required. "Required" means that either this checkbox must be checked or a value in "No FCR Reason" must be selected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Phone'), OR(ISPICKVAL( Type,'Quotes/Availability'),ISPICKVAL( Type,'Place Order'),ISPICKVAL( Type,'Order Status'),ISPICKVAL( Type,'Order Changes'),ISPICKVAL( Type,'Web'))), NOT(OR( First_Call_Resolution__c =false, ISPICKVAL( No_FCR_Reason__c , '')))) && $RecordType.Name !='CSM Toolbox' && not(ispickval(Status,'Cancelled')) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed as Duplicate') ) && $User.Id !='005300000042rPL'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check First Call Resolution or enter a No FCR Reason
